member.name: ID3D10EffectMatrixVariable.GetMatrix
member.param: A pointer to the first element in a matrix.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectMatrixVariable.GetMatrixArray
member.param: A pointer to the first element of the first matrix in an array of matrices.
The offset (in number of matrices) between the start of the array and the first matrix returned.
The number of matrices in the returned array.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectMatrixVariable.GetMatrixTranspose
member.summary: Transpose and get a floating-point matrix.
member.param: A pointer to the first element of a transposed matrix.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectMatrixVariable.GetMatrixTransposeArray
member.summary: Transpose and get an array of floating-point matrices.
member.param: A pointer to the first element of an array of transposed matrices.
The offset (in number of matrices) between the start of the array and the first matrix to get.
The number of matrices in the array to get.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectMatrixVariable.SetMatrix
member.param: A pointer to the first element in the matrix.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectMatrixVariable.SetMatrixArray
member.summary: Set an array of floating-point matrices.
member.param: A pointer to the first matrix.
The number of matrix elements to skip from the start of the array.
The number of elements to set.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectMatrixVariable.SetMatrixTranspose
member.summary: Transpose and set a floating-point matrix.
member.param: A pointer to the first element of a matrix.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectMatrixVariable.SetMatrixTransposeArray
member.summary: Transpose and set an array of floating-point matrices.
member.param: A pointer to an array of matrices.
The offset (in number of matrices) between the start of the array and the first matrix to set.
The number of matrices in the array to set.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectMatrixVariable
member.summary: A matrix-variable interface accesses a matrix.
